item.title: By: Jona
item.dc:creator: Jona
item.content:encoded:
Shame the ValidationSummary and ValidationMessage don’t work properly!

If you have a ValidationSummary and a ValidationMessage for a date field for example and you enter in text you get an error message where the ValidationMessage is but nothing in the ValidationSummary.

Ideally you want a * next to the field and the error message in the summary
